KnowledgeItem.Title: PostgreSQLUserManagementWorkflow
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for creating User Roles on Postgres by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding DataBlocks in the Issue.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock PostgreSQLUserManagementWorkflow and the necessary information for successful completion of workflow.

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks 			
				TargetMachine=${PSUMW:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created
				Host=${PSUMW:Host}
				User=${PSUMW:User}
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				Command='psql -c \"CREATE USER ${PSUMW:NewDBUserName} WITH PASSWORD '${PSUMW:NewDBPassword}'\"'
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				CurrentState=ReadState/> 
				</NewBlock>
